code: export var ADD_ONE="ADD_ONE";export var APPLY_NUMBER="APPLY_NUMBER";export var CHANGE_OPERATION="CHANGE_OPERATION";export var CLEAR_DISPLAY="CLEAR_DISPLAY";export var ADD_MEMORY="ADD_MEMORY";export var APPLY_RECALL_MEMORY="APPLY_RECALL_MEMORY";export var CLEAR_MEMORY="CLEAR_MEMORY";export var addOne=function addOne(){return{type:ADD_ONE};};export var applyNumber=function applyNumber(number){return{type:APPLY_NUMBER,payload:number};};export var changeOperation=function changeOperation(operator){return{type:CHANGE_OPERATION,payload:operator};};export var clearDisplay=function clearDisplay(){return{type:CLEAR_DISPLAY};};export var addMemory=function addMemory(){return{type:ADD_MEMORY};};export var applyRecalMemory=function applyRecalMemory(){return{type:APPLY_RECALL_MEMORY};};export var clearMemory=function clearMemory(){return{type:CLEAR_MEMORY};};
